      • sendError

        protected static ExecutionAbortedException sendError​(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                     int statusCode,
                                                     String error)
                                              throws ExecutionAbortedException
        Logs an error and sends it to ChatGPT, always throws ExecutionAbortedException. Use with pattern throw sendError(...) to let compiler know that.
        Throws:
        ExecutionAbortedException
